Name: DragonCrash
About the game: Experience the action-packed battle arena game that is DragonCrash! Select from four unique dragons and four game modes, then battle with or against your friends online! Create interesting combinations and different strategies with the unique abilities of each dragon while augmenting their stats with the various gems acquirable. Go through matchmaking or create private games with your friends! Game modes Hunt: Gather gems scattered across the world in order to capture the victory zone. Deathmatch: Kill other players and gather the gems they drop in order to capture the victory zone. Capture the Flag: Capture the enemy's flag while defending your own. Juiced: Grab the Juiced gem to greatly augment your dragon and score points from kills. Features 4 Unique Dragons! 4 Game Modes! 5 Power Ups! 3 Different Maps!
